Text: Hello therealways said that we would end up working together at some stage Actually Ive just logged into the mail system here in London were Im currently working on a project with Enron Metals Trading still employed by Cap Gemini Ernst Young though Whats Houston like Hot as usual I guess and Enron keeps you busy or Ive been doing a fair bit of travelling around Europe lately so London actually feels just like a short distance and a nice place to be since everybody speaks english and working with Enron is a challangening task This is going to be an interesting project Back home life goes on and I got married last october We really enjoy our house and in that sence its a pity to be away so much but you cant have it all can you Got to go Cheers Anders
